verses.name: Proverbs 31:7
verses.text: Let him drink, and forget his poverty, and remember his misery no more.

verses.name: Proverbs 31:8
verses.text: Open thy mouth for the dumb in the cause of all such as are appointed to destruction.

verses.name: Proverbs 31:9
verses.text: Open thy mouth, judge righteously, and plead the cause of the poor and needy.

verses.name: Proverbs 31:10
verses.text: Who can find a virtuous woman? for her price is far above rubies.

verses.name: Proverbs 31:11
verses.text: The heart of her husband doth safely trust in her, so that he shall have no need of spoil.

verses.name: Proverbs 31:12
verses.text: She will do him good and not evil all the days of her life.
